vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀδδεί (Rec. Ἀδδί), ὁ,
Addei: Luk.3:28.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Luk.3.28;
son of: Cosam (G2973);
father of: Melchi (G3197H)
§ Addi, [possibly] "my witness" or "adorned"
Addi, (Proper name) Lk. 3:28*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞底 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "裝飾"
哥桑的兒子,麥基的父親，耶穌基督的家譜(路 3:28)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚底 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "装饰"
哥桑的儿子,麦基的父亲，耶稣基督的家谱(路 3:28)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-đi « nhân chứng của tôi » H5716
